description.zh-cn: 三国时代蜀汉的开国皇帝，汉景帝后代，但世系久远，由布衣起兵。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period. A distant descendant of Emperor Jing of Han, he rose from a commoner background.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由刘备建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员、学者，刘备的老师。
description.en: An official and scholar of the late Eastern Han dynasty, and Liu Bei's teacher.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，刘备的同学和早期依附对象。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty, a fellow student and early patron of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的一次大规模农民起义。
description.en: A large-scale peasant rebellion in the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年徐州牧，曾将徐州让与刘备。
description.en: Governor of Xu Province in the late Eastern Han dynasty, who offered the province to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏政权的奠基者，刘备的主要对手之一。
description.en: A powerful minister of the late Eastern Han dynasty and the founder of the state of Cao Wei, one of Liu Bei's main rivals.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，一度是北方最强大的势力，刘备曾依附于他。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty, once the most powerful in the north, whom Liu Bei once served under.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年荆州牧，刘备曾长期依附于他。
description.en: Governor of Jing Province in the late Eastern Han dynasty, whom Liu Bei served for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉丞相，刘备最重要的谋士和托孤大臣。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han, Liu Bei's most important advisor and regent.

description.zh-cn: 东吴的建立者，与刘备时而结盟时而敌对。
description.en: The founder of Eastern Wu, who was sometimes an ally and sometimes an enemy to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 孙刘联军在赤壁以火攻大破曹操军队的关键战役。
description.en: A decisive battle where the allied forces of Sun Quan and Liu Bei defeated Cao Cao's army with a fire attack at Red Cliffs.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年益州牧，后被刘备夺取益州。
description.en: Governor of Yi Province in the late Eastern Han dynasty, whose territory was conquered by Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘备进攻并夺取刘璋所管辖的益州的战争。
description.en: The war in which Liu Bei attacked and conquered Yi Province from Liu Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 刘备与曹操争夺汉中地区的战役，刘备最终获胜。
description.en: A campaign between Liu Bei and Cao Cao for control of the Hanzhong region, which Liu Bei ultimately won.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在夺取汉中后自立的王号，是其称帝前的重要阶段。
description.en: The royal title Liu Bei claimed after conquering Hanzhong, an important step before he declared himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的结义兄弟和重要将领，以勇猛和忠义著称。
description.en: Liu Bei's sworn brother and a key general, known for his bravery and loyalty.

description.zh-cn: 刘备为报关羽之仇而发动的对孙吴的战争，最终惨败。
description.en: A war launched by Liu Bei against Sun Wu to avenge Guan Yu's death, which ended in a disastrous defeat.

description.zh-cn: 位于今重庆奉节，刘备兵败后退守并病逝于此，也是著名的“白帝托孤”发生地。
description.en: Located in modern-day Fengjie, Chongqing, it is where Liu Bei retreated after his defeat, passed away, and famously entrusted his heir to his advisors.

description.zh-cn: 刘备之子，蜀汉第二位皇帝，即“后主”。
description.en: Son of Liu Bei and the second emperor of Shu Han, also known as the 'Last Ruler'.

description.zh-cn: 刘备之父，早逝。
description.en: Father of Liu Bei, who died when Liu Bei was young.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的正室夫人，麋竺之妹。
description.en: Liu Bei's wife, the younger sister of Mi Zhu.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的继室夫人，孙权之妹。
description.en: Liu Bei's second wife, the younger sister of Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 刘备称帝后所立的皇后。
description.en: The empress installed by Liu Bei after he became emperor.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的妾室，刘禅的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Liu Bei and the birth mother of Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 刘备次子。
description.en: Liu Bei's second son.

description.zh-cn: 刘备三子。
description.en: Liu Bei's third son.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的养子。
description.en: Liu Bei's adopted son.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年著名将领和军阀，以勇武著称，曾与刘备有过复杂的争斗和联盟关系。
description.en: A famous general and warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty, known for his martial prowess, who had a complex relationship of conflict and alliance with Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 东吴将领，在夷陵之战中担任都督，大败刘备。
description.en: A general of Eastern Wu who served as the commander-in-chief in the Battle of Yiling and decisively defeated Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉将领及官员，与诸葛亮同为刘备的托孤大臣。
description.en: A general and official of Shu Han who, along with Zhuge Liang, was appointed as a regent by Liu Bei.

en: Three visits to the thatched cottage

description.zh-cn: 刘备三次亲自到访诸葛亮的住处，最终说服其出山辅佐自己的事件。
description.en: The event where Liu Bei personally visited Zhuge Liang's residence three times, ultimately persuading him to emerge from seclusion and serve as his advisor.

description.zh-cn: 刘备与公孙瓒等人一同拜卢植为师学习。
description.en: Liu Bei, along with Gongsun Zan and others, studied under Lu Zhi as his student.

description.zh-cn: 刘备与公孙瓒在卢植门下学习时结为好友，刘备视其为兄长。
description.en: Liu Bei and Gongsun Zan became good friends while studying under Lu Zhi, with Liu Bei treating him as an elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 刘备率领其下属跟随邹靖讨伐黄巾军，并立下战功。
description.en: Liu Bei led his followers to join Zou Jing in suppressing the Yellow Turban rebels, achieving military merit.

description.zh-cn: 因曹操攻打徐州，刘备应陶谦之邀率军救援，后依附于陶谦。
description.en: When Cao Cao attacked Xuzhou, Liu Bei led his troops to reinforce Tao Qian at his request and subsequently served under him.

description.zh-cn: 陶谦病重时，表示“非刘备不能安此州也”，其去世后，麋竺等人根据其遗愿迎刘备入主徐州。
description.en: When Tao Qian was critically ill, he stated that 'only Liu Bei can bring peace to this province.' After his death, Mi Zhu and others, following his will, invited Liu Bei to take over Xuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 在刘备与袁术相持时，吕布趁机偷袭下邳，夺取了徐州。
description.en: While Liu Bei was engaged in a standoff with Yuan Shu, Lü Bu launched a surprise attack on Xiapi and seized control of Xuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 在被吕布击败后，刘备走投无路，归顺曹操。
description.en: After being defeated by Lü Bu, Liu Bei had no other options and submitted to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 刘备借机脱离曹操控制后，杀死曹操任命的徐州刺史车胄，公然与曹操对立。
description.en: After breaking away from Cao Cao's control, Liu Bei killed Che Zhou, the Inspector of Xuzhou appointed by Cao Cao, openly opposing him.

description.zh-cn: 被曹操击败后，刘备逃往青州，投奔袁绍。
description.en: After being defeated by Cao Cao, Liu Bei fled to Qingzhou and sought refuge with Yuan Shao.

description.zh-cn: 离开袁绍后，刘备南下荆州投靠刘表，并被委任屯兵新野。
description.en: After leaving Yuan Shao, Liu Bei went south to Jing Province to join Liu Biao, and was assigned to station troops in Xinye.

description.zh-cn: 刘备为寻访人才，三次亲自前往隆中拜访诸葛亮。
description.en: In search of talent, Liu Bei personally visited Zhuge Liang in Longzhong three times.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的诚意打动了诸葛亮，使其同意出山辅佐。
description.en: Liu Bei's sincerity moved Zhuge Liang, who agreed to leave his seclusion to assist him.

description.zh-cn: 受刘备三顾茅庐之请，出山辅佐，后成为蜀汉丞相。
description.en: Persuaded by Liu Bei's three visits, he left his seclusion to assist him and later became the Chancellor of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 为对抗曹操，刘备派遣诸葛亮与孙权结盟，促成孙刘联军。
description.en: To counter Cao Cao, Liu Bei dispatched Zhuge Liang to form an alliance with Sun Quan, leading to the Sun-Liu coalition.

description.zh-cn: 孙刘联军在赤壁大败曹操，阻止了其南下统一的步伐。
description.en: The Sun-Liu allied forces decisively defeated Cao Cao at Red Cliffs, halting his southward campaign to unify China.

description.zh-cn: 刘备应刘璋之邀入蜀，后与刘璋决裂并发动战争，最终夺取益州。
description.en: Liu Bei entered Shu at Liu Zhang's invitation, later broke with him and launched a war, ultimately seizing control of Yi Province.

description.zh-cn: 此战导致刘璋势力覆灭，被迫向刘备投降。
description.en: This war led to the collapse of Liu Zhang's power, forcing him to surrender to Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 刘备为夺取战略要地汉中，亲率大军与曹操展开长期战役。
description.en: To capture the strategic region of Hanzhong, Liu Bei personally led a large army in a prolonged campaign against Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在汉中之战中获胜，曹操被迫放弃汉中，率军撤退。
description.en: Liu Bei was victorious in the Hanzhong Campaign, forcing Cao Cao to abandon Hanzhong and retreat with his army.

description.zh-cn: 夺取汉中后，刘备在群臣的联名上表下自立为汉中王。
description.en: After conquering Hanzhong, Liu Bei declared himself King of Hanzhong following a joint petition from his followers.

description.zh-cn: 孙权趁关羽北伐之际，派吕蒙偷袭荆州，并最终捕杀关羽。
description.en: While Guan Yu was on his northern campaign, Sun Quan dispatched Lü Meng to launch a surprise attack on Jing Province, ultimately capturing and executing Guan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕代汉后，刘备在成都称帝，国号为汉，史称蜀汉。
description.en: After Cao Pi usurped the Han throne, Liu Bei declared himself emperor in Chengdu, establishing the state of Han, historically known as Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 为给关羽报仇并夺回荆州，刘备不顾劝阻，执意发兵讨伐孙权。
description.en: To avenge Guan Yu and retake Jing Province, Liu Bei, against advice, insisted on launching a military campaign against Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 在夷陵之战中，东吴都督陆逊采取以逸待劳的策略，最终以火攻击溃刘备大军。
description.en: In the Battle of Yiling, the Eastern Wu commander Lu Xun adopted a strategy of wearing down the enemy, ultimately defeating Liu Bei's army with a fire attack.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在白帝城病逝前，将儿子刘禅及国家大事托付给丞相诸葛亮，并允许他在刘禅无能时“君可自取”。
description.en: Before his death in Baidicheng, Liu Bei entrusted his son Liu Shan and the affairs of the state to Chancellor Zhuge Liang, even permitting him to 'take the throne for himself' if Liu Shan proved incompetent.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在白帝城托孤时，任命尚书令李严为副手，与诸葛亮共同辅政。
description.en: When entrusting his heir in Baidicheng, Liu Bei appointed the Prefect of the Masters of Writing Li Yan as a deputy to assist Zhuge Liang in the regency.

description.zh-cn: 刘备是刘弘的儿子。
description.en: Liu Bei is the son of Liu Hong.

description.zh-cn: 刘禅是刘备的长子。
description.en: Liu Shan is the eldest son of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 为巩固孙刘联盟，孙权将其妹嫁予刘备。
description.en: To solidify the Sun-Liu alliance, Sun Quan married his younger sister to Liu Bei.
